japanese: 一花、これで荷物は全部だよ。
translation: Ichika, this is the last of all the luggage.

japanese:
ありがと。
忘れ物しても、ここじゃ取りに戻れないもんね。
translation:
Thanks.
We won't be able to come back here
if we forget something.

japanese:
火の元も水回りもちゃんと見てきたわ。
問題なしよ。
translation:
I checked the fire hazards
and wet areas thoroughly.
No issues.

japanese: 戸締まりも確認ずみ。
translation: Doors locked, check.

japanese:
うんうん！
これぞ立つ鳥跡を濁さずってやつだよね。
translation:
Okie-dokie!
A bird does not foul the nest it is about to leave,
right?

japanese:
おお、間違えないで言えてる。
ちゃんと成長してるねぇ。
translation:
Oh, you said it correctly.
You've really grown up.

japanese:
えへへー、上杉さんという家庭教師が
教えてくれてるからね。
translation: Ehehe, all thanks to our tutor, Uesugi-san.

japanese: あとは上杉君とらいはちゃんですが……。
translation: As for Uesugi-kun and Raiha-chan...

japanese:
あっ、上杉さん！
おはよーございます！
translation:
Ah, Uesugi-san!
Good mooorning!

japanese: ……おう。
translation: ...Hey.

japanese:
四葉さん、おはようございまーす。
夕べはよく眠れた？
translation:
Good morning, Yotsuba-san.
Did you sleep well last night?

japanese:
らいはちゃんもおはようございます！
ええ、もうバッチリです！
translation:
And a very good morning to you, Raiha-chan!
Yup, I slept like a log!

japanese:
お兄ちゃんは筋肉痛なんだって。
だから動きが変なの。
translation: Big bro's muscles are sore, and now he moves kinda weird.

japanese: ……バラすなよ。
translation: ...Don't tell them that.

japanese:
それは大変ですね～。
上杉さんも、少しは鍛えないとダメですよ？
えいえいっ！
translation:
Oh, that ain't good.
Uesugi-san, you need to exercise a little, too, okay?
Alrighty?!

japanese:
だー！　突っつくな！
マジで痛いんだぞ！？
らいはも真似するんじゃない！
translation:
Ouch! Don't poke me!
It really hurts, ya know?!
And don't copy her, Raiha!

japanese: あははははっ！
translation: Ahahahaha!

japanese: まだ迎えの船は見えないねー。
translation: We still can't see the boat that'll be picking us up.

japanese:
ああ、そういえば。
四葉とフー君が乗ったボートって
ここにあったのよねぇ？
translation:
Oh, that's right.
That boat that Yotsuba and Fu-kun were on
was around here, huuh?

japanese: ……お前、まだ怒ってるのか。
translation: ...Are you still mad?

japanese:
あはは……。
もう危ないことはしないから安心して。
translation:
Ahaha...
Don't worry. I won't do anything dangerous anymore.

japanese:
それで、沖でイルカと会ったんだっけ？
羨ましいなぁ。
translation:
Furthermore, you met some dolphins offshore, right?
I'm sooo jealous!

japanese:
うん、たくさん泳いでて、
ボートの近くまで来てくれたんだ。
translation:
Yup. There was a pod of dolphins swimming nearby,
and then they came pretty close to our boat.

japanese:
こう、ドッバーンってジャンプしたり、
並んで泳いだりして、すごかったですよね、
上杉さん。
translation:
They jumped and swam side by side.
It was amazing, right, Uesugi-san?

japanese: ああ、あれは見事だったな。
translation: Yeah, that was really something else.

japanese: ２人だけイルカを見れたなんてズルい～。
translation:
It's not fair
that only you two got to see the dolphins...

japanese: 私も見たかった……。
translation: I wanted to see them too...

japanese: もしかしたら、帰りの船で見られるかも？
translation: Maybe we'll see them on the boat on our way back?

japanese:
どうでしょう？
来るときも見られませんでしたし、
出会いやすい時間があるのかもしれません。
translation:
I wonder? We didn't see them when we came to the island,
so maybe there's a certain time frame when meeting 
them would be easier.

japanese:
あ、じゃあ、今度みんなで水族館に行こうよ！
みんなで！
translation:
Oh, then let's all go to the aquarium next time!
All together!

japanese:
いいわね、それ！
もちろんフー君もよ？
translation:
That's a really good idea!
Fu-kun, you'll come too, right?

japanese:
ああ、まあ、別に構わないが。
らいはも行きたいだろうし。
translation:
Ah, well, I don't mind.
Raiha probably wants to go too.

japanese: うん、行きたい！
translation: Yeah, I wanna go!

japanese:
じゃあ、帰ったら
イルカショーをやってる水族館を調べないと。
translation:
When we get back home,
we need to look for an aquarium that has a dolphin show.

japanese:
ショーだったらアシカも見たい。
ペンギンも。
translation:
If it's a show, I want to see sea lions too.
And penguins.

japanese: ふふ、三玖は欲張りですね。
translation: Teehee, Miku sure is greedy.

japanese:
じゃあ、イルカもアシカもペンギンも、
ぜーんぶ、みんなで見ちゃおうよ！
translation:
Let's visit it together!
Dolphins, sea lions, and penguins!

japanese:
要望が多いわねぇ。
誰が調べると思ってるのよ。
translation:
These are a lot of requests.
Who do you think will look all that up?

japanese:
ねえ、二乃。
私はクラゲも見られる水族館がいいな～。
translation:
Hey, Nino.
I want to visit an aquarium, where we can see jellyfish too.

japanese:
はいはい、わかったわ。
イルカにアシカにペンギンに、クラゲもね？
translation:
Yeah, yeah, I got it.
Dolphins, sea lions, penguins, and jellyfish, right?

japanese:
えへへ、楽しみですよね上杉さん。
みんなで行くの。
translation:
Hahaha, aren't you excited, Uesugi-san?
Visiting the aquarium with everyone.

japanese: ああ、そうだな。
translation: Yeah, I am.

japanese:
でも、簡単にオッケーしてくれましたね？
もう少し抵抗されるかと思ってました。
戻ったら勉強だろ！　とか。
translation:
Wow, you agreed so easily.
I thought you'd resist a little more, and say something like
'Stop lazing around, it's time to study!' or something.

japanese:
らいはも行きたがってるし、断る理由もない。
それに、お前には……。
translation:
Raiha wants to go too,
and there's no reason to refuse accompanying you guys.
Besides...

japanese: えっ……？
translation: Huh...?

japanese: もっといい想い出を作ろうって言っただろ？
translation:
I said I wanted to create
even better memories with you, right?

japanese:
あはは、そうでした。
まだこの夏は終わってないんでした。
translation:
Ahaha, that's right.
This summer not over yet!

japanese:
上杉さんと、そしてみんなと一緒に、
もーっと楽しい想い出を作っていきましょう。
translation:
I wanna create even MORE fun memories together with you,
Uesugi-san, and everybody else.
